attributes.action: create legislation so that any person found guilty, or admiting guilt be fined £100 which is to be retained by the arresting Police Force ontop of any fine/punishment handed down by the courts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Its time to make criminals pay.

Every person found guilty should face an automatic bill of £100.  Of this £40 could be retained by the Police force which got the criminal to be spent on inititives as they see fit, with the other £40 going to a national pot to be ringfenced for tackling crime.  £20 to cover the administration costs of the scheme.

When determining Police funding the government should not take into account the money raised in the manner I describe as this should be seen as additional funding.

HM Government should adopt this idea and encourge the Scottish Parliament to enact similar legislation.
